thread.title: Girls long weekend in NYC
thread.title_full: Girls long weekend in NYC - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Finneymart
title: Girls long weekend in NYC
text: Myself and 3 girl friends stayed here for 4 nights! We chose it due to its excellent location to Times Square, subway and tourist bus links on Broadway! The room was a good size and cleaned daily, with 4 ladies in one room we could have done with more storage/hanging space. The breakfast was included and a great bonus it can get a little busy at peak times. The staff at the desk very friendly and helpful we had a problem with our bags being delayed which they helped. Would definitely stay here again great value for money. Great views of Empire State Building from our room
